title: Giving Zakat on behalf of the deceased - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: what about zakat money my father pays the cat in Ramadan he died in Shaba chaiwalla in eighth but because he was sick he was unable to pay it in this case it is ullas right in the wealth give 2.5% of his cash or whatever he used to give the cat from if he died before the time of zakat there is no sir cut it's over
